ygData.subject: Re: URI construction for REST API and use of verbs as resource?
ygData.msgSnippet: Not a fan of using http verbs as resources. Algorithms are fine as resources per Roy. I would post to algorithms. I did ecommerce api and fell in love with

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="UTF-8"

Not a fan of using http verbs as resources. Algorithms are fine as
resources per Roy. I would post to algorithms.


I did ecommerce api and fell in love with PATCH for changing resources
state.

--001a1140f74c6e859805278e6197
Content-Type: text/html; charset="UTF-8"

<p dir="ltr">Not a fan of using http verbs as resources. Algorithms are fine as resources per Roy. I would post to algorithms. </p>
<p dir="ltr">I did ecommerce api and fell in love with PATCH for changing resources state. </p>
